channel.title: Rune Arrow Glitch
channel.description: Can somebody [b]PLEASE[/b] help me change dthe required lvl of rune arrow to lvl 1? I've been working at it for a few hours and nothing I've tried has worked... Bit of a noob coder I guess :([br][size=1]Posted on: February 14, 2007, 10:19:03 PM[/size][hr]yet again, I figure out my problems on my own. jeez, with enough of this, I'll be writing my own tutorials....

item.title: Rune Arrow Glitch
item.dc:creator: @java1 -java-
item.description:
@java1 wrote:

lol this is very easy to do search for,

if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1;

now delete that and add this

if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze") || ItemName.endsWith("chaps") || ItemName.endsWith("arrow") || ItemName.endsWith("2h") || ItemName.endsWith("amb's") || ItemName.endsWith("glovez") || ItemName.endsWith("spear") || ItemName.endsWith("halberd") || ItemName.endsWith("dagger") || ItemName.endsWith("cavalier")) { return 1;

sorry couldn’t be bothered to edit my servers stuff to post here that fixed some stuff any ways.

hope this helped btw client.java is what u need to go in

Read full topic
